ComicInfo.Summary:
Sara wakes up at Jake's house, completely healed after last night's action. The Witchblade shrinks down to a little bracelet on her wrist. Meanwhile, Sara's ward, Lisa Buzanis is at a modeling agency trying to get a job. Kenneth Irons tortures Nottingham for having attacked Sara. The two later go to meet Sting to arrange for a charitable contribution. Sara decides to investigate Irons and goes to his office building. Somehow he is aware that she is spying on him! Sara continues to investigate back at the police station. Later, Nottingham has a weird dream about Sara and the microwave murders... or maybe they are both sharing a dream?
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-02-15 09:45:00. [CVDB51959]
